actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services, or his designee, to utilized the money proceeds from the disposal of land at the Fort Bliss Military Reservation to purchase lands in El Paso County, Tex., for subsequent transferral to the Secretary of the Army or his designee.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services, or his designee, to utilize the money proceeds from the disposal of land at the Fort Bliss Military Reservation to purchase lands in El Paso County, Texas, for subsequent transferral to the Secretary of the Army or his designee.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services, or his designee, to utilized the money proceeds from the disposal of land at the Fort Bliss Military Reservation to purchase lands in El Paso County, Tex., for subsequent transferral to the Secretary of the Army or his designee.
